title: Pixel 3 Phone calls not working, only works in speaker mode. Caller cannot hear/I cannot hear them
content:
Caller cannot hear me, I cannot hear the caller. 
Only when I turn speaker phone on will mic/speaker work
Using Pixel 3, system up to date Android 10 with 10/5 patch

Solutions tried:
- Phone Restarted
- Uninstalled/reinstalled phone app
- Uninstalled/reinstalled google app
- Start in Safe mode did not work
- Even air blasted the USB-C/speakers

Only option at this point is a factory reset, honestly I don't want to do this. Suggestions? Anyone else dealing with this?
